channel.title: Networking on physical gateway using wifi and ethernet
channel.description: I'm trying to get a physical gateway set up. I have two internet controllers on this device, one is wifi, the other is eth0. I will need to connect any workstations to the gateway via eth0. So how do I configure the gateway to use wifi as its connection to the internet????
